channel.title: CVE Feed for XML-Sitemaps -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for XML-Sitemaps -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-20845|2024-08-03T17:53:22.974Z -- xml-sitemaps -- unlimited%20sitemap%20generator
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Unlimited Sitemap Generator versions prior to v8.2 allows a remote attacker to hijack the authentication of an administrator and conduct arbitrary operation via a specially crafted web page.
